meanings.definition: Letters or packages sent or delivered by postal service.
meanings.sent1: I received two mails from my pen pal.
meanings.sent2: The postman delivers mails to our house every day.
meanings.sent3: My cat loves to play with the empty mails boxes.
meanings.sent4: The pile of mails on the table was like a mountain of surprises.
meanings.sent5: The colorful stamps on the mails made them look like tiny presents.

meanings.definition: To send letters or packages by postal service.
meanings.sent1: She mails her grandma a birthday card every year.
meanings.sent2: He mails important documents to clients regularly.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel tried to mail a acorn to its friend.
meanings.sent4: His words of encouragement mailed hope to her heart.
meanings.sent5: The post office mails packages with care and speed.
